snippet: Wilmer Flores’s strong performances thus far have piqued the Mets’ interest enough to see what his real abilities — and limitations — might be.
abstract: New York Mets prospect Wilmer Flores, who was called up to play third base in place of David Wright, who injured his hamstring, has been solid on the field and at the plate; after going hitless during his first game, Flores drove in nine runs over his next five games, getting at least one RBI each night.
lead_paragraph: Wilmer Flores’s strong performances thus far have piqued the Mets’ interest enough to see what his real abilities — and limitations — might be.

headline.main: To Keep Flores’s Bat in Lineup, Mets Plan to Move Him Around the Infield
headline.print_headline: To Keep Flores’s Bat in Lineup, Mets Plan to Move Him Around the Infield
